DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to export data (e.g. customer content or system-generated logs), associated with any user in your company, when the app is used by a privileged user (e.g. a Company Administrator).
DelegatedWork.userDescription: Allows the app to export data (e.g. customer content or system-generated logs), associated with any user in your company, when the app is used by a privileged user (e.g. a Company Administrator).

Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to export data (e.g. customer content or system-generated logs), associated with any user in your company, when the app is used by a privileged user (e.g. a Company Administrator).

DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Invite guest users to the organization
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to invite guest users to the organization, on behalf of the signed-in user.
DelegatedWork.userDisplayName: Invite guest users to the organization
DelegatedWork.userDescription: Allows the app to invite guest users to the organization, on your behalf.

Application.adminDisplayName: Invite guest users to the organization
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to invite guest users to the organization, without a signed-in user.

DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to read, update and delete identities that are associated with a user's account that the signed-in user has access to. This controls the identities users can sign-in with.
DelegatedWork.userDescription: Allows the app to read, update and delete identities that are associated with a user's account that you have access to. This controls the identities users can sign-in with.

Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read, update and delete identities that are associated with a user's account, without a signed in user. This controls the identities users can sign-in with.

DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Sign in and read user profile
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows users to sign-in to the app, and allows the app to read the profile of signed-in users. It also allows the app to read basic company information of signed-in users.
DelegatedWork.userDisplayName: Sign you in and read your profile
DelegatedWork.userDescription: Allows you to sign in to the app with your organizational account and let the app read your profile. It also allows the app to read basic company information.

DelegatedPersonal.adminDisplayName: Sign in and read user profile
DelegatedPersonal.adminDescription: Allows users to sign-in to the app, and allows the app to read the profile of signed-in users. It also allows the app to read basic company information of signed-in users.
DelegatedPersonal.userDisplayName: Sign you in and read your profile
DelegatedPersonal.userDescription: Allows you to sign in to the app with your organizational account and let the app read your profile. It also allows the app to read basic company information.

DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to read the full set of profile properties, reports, and managers of other users in your organization, on behalf of the signed-in user.
DelegatedWork.userDescription: Allows the app to read the full set of profile properties, reports, and managers of other users in your organization, on your behalf.

Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read user profiles without a signed in user.

DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to read a basic set of profile properties of other users in your organization on behalf of the signed-in user. This includes display name, first and last name, email address and photo.
DelegatedWork.userDescription: Allows the app to read a basic set of profile properties of other users in your organization on your behalf. Includes display name, first and last name, email address and photo.

DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Read and write access to user profile
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to read your profile. It also allows the app to update your profile information on your behalf.
DelegatedWork.userDescription: Allows the app to read your profile, and discover your group membership, reports and manager. It also allows the app to update your profile information on your behalf.

DelegatedPersonal.adminDisplayName: Read and write access to user profile
DelegatedPersonal.adminDescription: Allows the app to read your profile. It also allows the app to update your profile information on your behalf.
DelegatedPersonal.userDescription: Allows the app to read your profile, and discover your group membership, reports and manager. It also allows the app to update your profile information on your behalf.

DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Read and write all users' full profiles
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to read and write the full set of profile properties, reports, and managers of other users in your organization, on behalf of the signed-in user.
DelegatedWork.userDisplayName: Read and write all users' full profiles
DelegatedWork.userDescription: Allows the app to read and write the full set of profile properties, reports, and managers of other users in your organization, on your behalf.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write all users' full profiles
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read and update user profiles without a signed in user.
